Life360 is a free smartphone app that helps keep families and close friends stay in sync throughout their busy day. With Life360, you can see where your family and friends are on a private map, stay in touch with group and one-on-one messaging, and get help in an emergency. Life360 was started in 2008 and has 70 million members and growing!

Yes! Our core service is (and always will be) 100%% free of charge. However, we do offer some premium features for a small monthly fee. Life360 Premium is $%1$.2f/month and gives you more of the app you love. Plus, you can try it for free for 30 days!

We work on iPhone, Android, and Windows devices or over SMS using a non-smartphone. We were previously able to offer a beta app in Blackberry, but this app has been discontinued.

You can also use our app on iPods, iPads and some other tablet devices, but your location will only update when you are connected to the internet.

To locate someone who owns a non-smartphone, you will need to upgrade to Life360 Premium, which is $%1$.2f per month.

With the push of a button, the app will instantly connect you to a real person who can:

· See your current location
· Give you personalized crisis care
· Access your emergency profile

Can you limit the number of emergencies in your life? Of course not. That’s why you will have unlimited use of the service and there is not a limit to the number of calls you can make.
A Circle Member stopped updating. How do I fix this?

First, make sure they have the newest version of the app and are logged in — you’d be surprised how often this is what is wrong! If you still are having issues, take a look at our troubleshooting guide.
Can I lock the app on a Circle Member’s phone?

No. Anyone in your Circle can uninstall the app at any time. We don’t see ourselves as a “tracking” company, and believe our app is at its best when we are used as a communication and safety tool, not as a big brother.
What is the Crime Alert feature?

The purple pins you see on your map are areas where a crime was reported. This feature is available inside the Life360 app in the US and parts of the UK, but some cities will not have crime stats available.

To select how often you want the crime data to update, follow the steps below.

Open Menu
Tap on Settings
Tap on Map Options
Tap Crime
Choose Time Frame (The feature will default to Auto-Select which means we will show you the most recent crime in the area you are searching)
How do I turn the Crime Alert pins off?

To hide the purple Crime Alert pins, follow these steps in the app:

Open Menu
Tap on Settings
Tap on Map Options
Tap Crime
Select OFF
Can someone locate me without me knowing it?

No, for someone to find your location using Life360, you will need to give us your explicit permission by installing our app and logging into your account or if you have a non-smartphone, replying YES to the text message invitation which asks you to join a Circle. As soon as you logout of Life360, no one will be able to locate you. Similarly, if you reply NO to the text message invitation on your non-smartphone, you cannot be located.
How do I improve an inaccurate location?

The first thing you should do is make sure your Circle member has all location services turned ON on their phone, including GPS and WiFi.\n\nPlease note that accuracy depends on many factors, such as your environment and your phone. At times, a highly accurate location won’t be available.
Does the app drain my battery?

Life360 has the lowest battery drain of all locator apps on the market. We have an advanced algorithm that helps us decide when to wake up your phone and update your location—so we never just leave your GPS on.\n\nBut, every app that uses location will use some extra battery. Most users should expect about 10% shorter battery life when running Life360.
Yes, we use bank level SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) encryption and other military grade security protocols. We are independently verified by VeriSign.
How do I cancel my free account?

Canceling your account is easy!

Go to the Menu screen
Tap on Settings
Select “Account”
Choose Delete Account.

This will delete your entire account and remove you from all Circles on Life360!
Where do I get more help or send feedback?

We’d love to hear from you! Feel free to send any feedback or stories of how you’ve used the app to support@life360.com. If you are having problems with your account, you can visit our support forum at support.life360.com. If you can’t find an answer there, send an email to support@life360.com
I don’t want to share my location.

You can turn off your location in any of your Circles. Turning off your location in one Circle will not affect your location sharing in other Circles. Keep in mind, check ins will update your location for that Circle even if location sharing is turned off. If you press the Help Alert button, this will turn location sharing back on for that Circle.

To stop sharing your location, follow these steps:

Go to the Circle you want to edit
Open the Menu
Go to Location Sharing
Switch your Location Sharing to OFF
What does it mean to be a Circle Admin?

Only Admins can invite people to join the Circle, edit Places, and deleted Circle members.

To give Admin rights, follow these steps

Go to the Settings
Go to Circles
Choose the Circle you want to edit
Check the Admin box
What are the symbols above a member’s icon?

· The speech bubble will take you directly into creating a new message
· The phone gives you the option to call that person
· The trail opens up that person’s location history
· The circular arrow manually updates that person’s location
· The check mark send them a request to check in
· The pin with a plus lets you set up a Place
Can I download Life360 to my Blackberry phone?

The Life360 app is not available for Blackberry phones. However, Blackberry devices can be added as non-smartphones to your Circle and located by purchasing our Life360 Premium service for $%1$.2f/month.
How do I update or change my credit card information?

To edit your payment information, log in to our website at Life360.com with your current email address and password used for the Life360 application. On the upper right-hand corner, select the drop box next to your name and then select "Billing" to edit your credit card.
How do I stop receiving Circle email notifications?

You can control all Circle notifications in Settings.

Open Menu
Settings
Alert Options
Choose the Circle for which you’d like to disable email notifications
Disable Email Alerts by unchecking the box
There’s a new street that’s not on the map, is the map outdated?

We use Google (Android), Apple (iOS) and Microsoft (Windows) as our mapping provider. When they update the map, it is automatically updated in our app! Unfortunately we have no control over when that might happen.
Can I use Life360 to locate my lost phone?

If you log into your account at www.life360.com, you will be able to see the last location where your phone updated. You can also have Circle Members open the Life360 app on their phone and update the lost phone’s location. For the best location possible on your phone, we recommend having your GPS and Wifi always on. If the app is not logged in or if the phone is turned off, the location will not update.
How do I invite someone that does not have a smartphone?

First, add them to your Circle in the app. On the invite page, choose the “No Smartphone” option. They will receive an SMS invitation to join your Circle. Once they accept by replying YES, you can update their location at any time. This service can only be used in the United States and works on any of these carriers: AT&T, Verizon, TMobile, or Sprint.

If you log into your account at www.life360.com, you will see a message icon on the left side menu. Here, you can delete any message that you have sent to your Circle members. Note: System messages can not be deleted.
Is the History feature available on all smartphones?

Currently, the History feature is available on iPhone and Android devices. You can also access History for any Circle member on our website at life360.com. Follow these steps to view History on the website:

1) Log into your account at www.life360.com
2) On the left side menu, click on History
3) Choose the user whose History you want to view
Why am I not receiving sms/text messages?

This is a Life360 Premium service. To receive sms/texts of private messages, upgrade to our Life360 Premium service for $%1$.2f per month. This will include all of our other Life360 Premium service as well!
Can I get sms/text messages for Place notifications?
We are unable to support text messages for Place alerts, but you can receive push notifications and emails for each Place you set up.
How do I unsubscribe? I do not want to be a part of Life360.
You can reply #stop to any text message from Life360 to add your number to our unsubscribe list. If you received an email, there is an unsubscribe link at the bottom of the email message.
To contact us, please email us at support@life360.com .\nIf you’re a Premium member, you also have the option to call support from the Premium menu in the app.
Why would the application show me in a wrong location?

When the app is running in the background on a device, it can lose accuracy which can make it appear that a user is somewhere they are not. The solution for this is for the person viewing your location to run a manual update, which will bring the location back to the most accurate we can get, based on signal quality.\n\nIf it was bouncing between work and home, it is possible you’re logged in on more than one device with the same email address (being simultaneously logged in an iPad and an iPhone can cause all sorts of issues with updates.)
What is Life360 Premium and how much does it cost?

Life360 Premium offers more of the app you love, for just $%1$.2f/month or $%2$.2f/year!\n\n24/7 Live Advisor gives your Circle Members access to a real person, no matter what time day or night, who can help in case of emergency. You’ll also get unlimited location updates for non-smartphones, unlimited Places, %3$s in stolen phone protection, and expanded History data. Some features not available outside of the US.
How do I receive the %1$s for my stolen phone?
Send an email to stolenphone@life360.com to receive the correct claim form to fill out.
Does the $%1$.2f/month non-smartphone locating service work outside of the USA?

You can locate any Circle member that downloads the app to their phone. However, the locating service for non-smartphones will not work outside of the US. We hope to expand this services to other countries in the future.
How do I cancel Life360 Premium?

It’s easy! If you purchased Life360 Premium with Google Wallet, manage your subscription’s billing by visiting the Play Store on your device.

On the Play Store, search for Life360. At the top of the page, click the Cancel button to stop your Life360 Premium subscription. For more information of Google Play subscriptions: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2476088?topic=1046717&ctx=topic&hl=en&rd=1

If you purchased Life360 Premium with your credit card, follow these steps to cancel your subscription:

Log into your account at www.life360.com
In the upper right hand corner, click the drop-down arrow and select Billing
Select the desired Premium Circle to cancel and click Continue
There will be an option below Premium Subscription to cancel

For further help, you can always email support@life360.com

Also- be aware that uninstalling an app will not cancel your subscription. You must cancel your subscription in order to not be billed. If you uninstall the app without canceling your subscription, you will still be billed.
How do I purchase the $%1$.2f/month Life360 Premium service to locate a non-smartphone?

You will first need to complete the set-up process for the Circle member you wish to locate using this service. Add the member to your Circle and have them accept the invite to join. They will be sent a text message asking if they agree to be located. Once they reply YES, you can update their location at any time. After the first update, you will be given the option to purchase the service.

To edit your billing information:

Log on to www.life360.com with your email and password
In the top right drop down menu, select Billing
Edit credit card and billing information


Can I purchase Premium service outside the United States?

Life360 Premium can be purchased in most countries. However, be aware that some Premium features are only available in the USA and Canada.
Can I purchase Premium service outside the United States?
Life360 Premium can be purchased in most countries. However, be aware that some Premium features are only available in the USA and Canada.

Circles are a way to stay connected to all of the most important people in your life in individual, private groups. It allows you to be a part of multiple families or groups easily within your Life360 app. Try it out! Create a Circle for your babysitters, dog walkers, or work pals.
How many members can be in my Circle?
Add as many friends and family to your Circles as you need!
How do I make two Circles into just one Circle?
You cannot merge two Circles together at this time, but you can invite anyone you want into your Circle. You can also leave any Circle you no longer want to be in.
Can I be in two different Circles?
Yes! You can join multiple, private groups easily inside the Life360 app.
If I have Life360 Premium for one Circle, do I have it for all Circles?
No, you will need to purchase Life360 Premium for each Circle.
How do I remove someone from my Circle?

All Admins have the ability to delete Circle members. You can delete a Circle member online or in the app.

Go to the Menu
Go to Settings
Tap Circle Options
Choose the Circle you want to edit
Press the trash bin icon next to their name
How do I add profile photos for my Circles?

Each user must add their own photo. There are a few ways to add a photo to your account.

Open the Menu
Settings
Tap your silhouette
Click Edit
Click your silhouette
Add a photo from your gallery
How do I remove myself from a Circle?

Removing yourself from a Circle doesn’t delete your account. To remove yourself from a Circle, follow these steps:

Open the Menu
Go to Settings
Go to Circle Options
Choose the Circle you want to leave
Press Leave This Circle
How do I create a Circle?

To create a Circle, follow these steps:

Open the Menu
Select "add circle"
Choose what type of Circle you want to create. You can use one of our handy suggestions or customize your own!
Why is the app showing latitude and longitude instead of address?

We work with a mapping provider to show the street address of your location. The map provider occasionally has problems giving us the exact street address. Instead of showing "Unknown" for the address, we show your Latitude and Longitude. We are working with the map provider to improve this.
Why Do My Circles Have Different Colors?
Circle color is based on order or how many Circles created (so they don’t look exactly the same since you can’t customize yet).
Will any phone, anywhere work with Places?

This service can be used anywhere in the world. For the service to work, the phone you are locating will need to be an iPhone, Android, or Windows device with the Life360 app installed, connected to the internet, and have location sharing turned on.
How can I delete a Place?

You can delete the Place as long as you are an Admin. To delete the Place, follow these steps:

Open the Menu in the Life360 app
Tap on Places
Tap on the place you would like to delete
Hit the Edit Place button
Select "Delete"
How do I change my Places addresses, if incorrect?

Only Circle Admins can edit Places. To edit a Place, follow these steps:

Open Menu
Select Places
Select the Place you want to edit
Tap "Edit"
Move the Pin Icon on the map to the correct address or manually enter the correct address
Select Save
Do I need to be at the location I want to set up as a Place?
No, you can set a location from anywhere.
What are Places and how do I set them up?

Places are a great way to know when your loved ones are leaving work or just arrived at school! Places are areas you can define inside the Life360 app so that you are alerted when a Circle member enters or leaves a location. Some places you might want to set up are work, home, and school. To set up Places, follow these steps:

Open Menu
Select Places
Click Add Place
Move the Pin Icon on the map to the correct address or manually enter the correct address
Select Save
How do I set up more than two Places?
To set up more Places, you can purchase Life360 Premium for just $%1$.2f/month.
If you can’t find an answer here, please send an email to support@life360.com
I certify I am at least 13 years old and accept the TOS and Privacy Policy. To invite a family member under 13, you must submit a Parental Consent Form.

Your location will also update automatically when you change locations
Peace of mind when you need it most

Let Life360 Premium throw you and your family a lifeline. Push the Live Advisor button, and we will instantly connect you to a real person who can:
• Direct emergency responders to your exact location
• Give you personalized crisis care
• Access your emergency profile
Let us coordinate the tow truck the next time you need one!
Our live dispatchers are available 24/7, and they’ll use your exact coordinates to minimize the time you spend waiting by the side of the road.
Do you have family members without smartphones?

We’ve got you covered. With Life360 Premium, you can locate up to six phones free. We’ll be honest – the locations will not be as accurate due to the lack of GPS technology, but you’ll still have peace of mind.
Your family is like a hive of bees, scurrying to and fro.
With Life360 Premium, you’ll be able to synchronize more of their locations, so you don’t have to send those annoying text messages to make sure everyone is where you expect them to be.
Sad, but true: it\'s sometimes hard to hang on to your cellphone, especially if someone else decides to walk off with it.
Life360 can potentially help you get it back, but in the event that you can\'t, we’ll give you %1s toward your next phone with a qualifying claim.
In this case, more is more.
See your family\'s location points over past 30 days and maybe you will alter your carpool route or vow to spend less time at the office.
Upgrade this Circle to get more of the app you love, 80% less than comparable services from OnStar and your cellular carrier

Upgrade %1$s for free.
Cancel within %2$d days and you won\'t be billed.
Cancel within first %d days and you won\'t be billed. Love it? Keep enjoying Premium with the plan you select below.

You may not see a user\'s location if:
The user closed Life360 as an active app on their smartphone (Ask them to open Life360)
The user turned off their phone
The user entered an area where there is no network connection
Their phone is in Airplane mode
The user needs to update to the latest version of Life360
Feel free to email support at support@life360.com

Select your new payment plan and upgrade now
More of what you love from Life360
Set up unlimited Place alerts for the whole family. Get notified when your family members come and go from home, work, school, and any other important locations.
See where your family is coming and going. We store 30 days of history so you can look back in time.
Get faster location updates for any family member with an Android device.
The ultimate lifeline for everyone in your Circle, to aid in a crisis or everyday assistance.

Stay informed about local crime, including details about the incident (e.g. theft, burglary, vandalism) and location. You\'ll also be able to see registered sex offenders who live in your neighborhood.
Questions about how the app works? Need help with your account? When you contact support, we\'ll give you priority service, and respond within 24 hours.
Driving Peace of Mind for the Entire Family
Everyone in your circle is covered. Whether drivers or passengers, any car or a carpool, if anyone in your family is on the road, we have them protected.

Be a family of better, safer drivers. The Safe Drive Review feature automatically detects when a user is driving, and provides in-depth information about the trip, including alerts for aggressive driving, hard acceleration, hard braking, unsafe texting and phone use, and speeding.

Keep your family safe on the road with our automatic crash response system. We detect when a car accident occurs, and call the driver or passenger involved. If they need immediate emergency assistance, or don\'t respond, we send their location data to emergency services to dispatch an ambulance and will stay on the line with them until help arrives. We will call you and your emergency contacts to let you know what occurred afterwards.
The ultimate lifeline for everyone in your Circle, to aid in a crisis or everyday assistance.

Get peace of mind with comprehensive roadside assistance for your family. Whether they need to jump start their battery, were locked out of their car, ran out of gas, need to change a flat tire, or need a tow, we got you covered. Up to 2 incidents per year for $100 per incident, and 2 gallons of gas for refueling.

Give your family access to a direct hotline, where a trained advisor can help a driver find nearby garages, hospitals, help contacting emergency contacts, or minor accident support. A real person will be available to support you and your family, 24/7.
Security, freedom and peace mind for the people, places and things that matter most
